title: Hlau suh Pathian i phaw
lyrics:
Hlau suh, Pathian i phaw,
I lawmman hlu a ni;
A chaknain a hneh,
Lalpa i tha a ni.

Hlau suh, a aw a ni,
He thu hi a sawi chu,
"Tho la, i Lal Isua,
Kristaah chuan lawm rawh."

Hlau suh, aman a hria,
I mangang au rawl hi;
A thu lawmawm tak chuan,
I thla chau a tinung.

Hlau suh, zam hek suh la,
I hnenah a awm reng,
A tanpui zel ang che,
Tin, i lo chak leh ang.

Hlau s'u, pawl tlemte u,
In tlantu duh tak chu,
A lo kal thuai dawn e,
A hruai ngei ang che u.
